name: Rose Blevins
text: The first day I walked into the staffing agency I was greeted professionally and friendly by Brian at the front desk. I inquired about employment and he gave me more information than I expected. More than any staffing agency I had been to because for some reason, they act like giving employment info is a secret and you have to be initiated first to get any help. Brian made me feel like he was actually interested in helping me find employment. The Registration process was easy. I came back the next day to complete everything because I had an appointment. I meet with other staff members Shannon and Johnny. They too were friendly, kind, and professional. Just like Brian, with them, I also felt like they genuinely wanted to help me. I haven't felt like that about a staffing agency in a VERY long time. While I was there, I also noticed the way Brian interacted and talked to other job seekers that came into the office. The same way he treated me, with respect, professionalism, care, and a positive attitude. That really won me over and stood out in my mind. I also followed up with Sandra over the phone and she displayed the same professionalism that I encountered with the other staff at Elwood. I was blown away! She was so helpful when I called. I truly recommend Elwood staffing to any job seeker that is looking for employment. They really make you feel like they care about helping you when you walk in the door. They have what other staffing agencies lack these days, GREAT customer service!

name: Vernon B
text: I've consulted with Darrell Walker Workforce many times regarding several of their employment services, including job placement, executive search, and workforce planning. On one occasion, I met with their administrative staff and recruiters in their Birmingham office. Throughout our 4 hour+ meeting, I was impressed with their attentiveness to my specific needs, eagerness and ability to answer my questions, breadth of knowledge about the staffing industry, and the years of experience they (literally) brought to the table. As an aside, they were providing temp services way back before the word "personnel" fell out of favor! I know I'm in good hands with Darrell Walker and will continue calling on them in the future for my staffing and payroll outsourcing needs.

resp.text: Hi Vernon! We remember that marathon meeting quite well. And we enjoyed every minute of it! text:
A good way to get hired onto Honda. Or get your foot in the door without a special degree. Infact I think the only way. You have to spend way to much time to get hired onto Honda. Its excruciating. Honda is already strict. I have no problem with that. But a temp agency compared to that is too far. Getting less pay and worse benefits is fine. But they need more PTO and quicker attendance forgiveness. Also they need to give each person a pamlet evertime they update something and go over the best ways to not miss days. I was unaware of some because they didnt go over it at all or enough and it cost me two points instead of one. Also they(the elwood office) make mistakes just like anyone
But there mistakes can cost you your job or get you a piont. And they would never take the fall.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us on your experience working at Honda. We will pass this along for coaching and training. We are perplexed on the mistake you reference. If you would like to speak to someone further about your experience, please reach out to our Associate Engagement team at 812.418.0962.

name: Sydney Ariel
text: Elwood is a great place to go. Very friendly and helpful staff! Mrs. Barnwell in particular was very helpful and professional to me over the phone.

text: Christy was very helpful for me with updating all my information and getting me a job the first time I went to apply for one. It was a good experience and very friendly environment. I highly recommend Elwood Staffing in Talladega and I Highly recommend Christy as a Rep to help you with all your info and getting you a job ASAP.

resp.text: Awe, thank you. We are glad you've had a good experience with us. Our team in Talladega is awesome. You are very fortunate to work with any of our recruiters.

name: Donna Bruce
text:
Crystal was fantastic. Very efficient and curtious. I could not have asked to have been treated with more respect.
The staff at my assignment however could use some improvement on thier communication skills. Things they told us were confusing and contradictory at times. Please note i am not speaking about the people in the local office. They were great.
I must say I am very appreciative.

resp.text: Donna, we appreciate your feedback. This is very useful information. We'll follow up with the local team to learn how we can better assist our associates and make the process easier. Thanks for sharing.
